snippet.title: Hierofanía 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for my upcoming visual novel, Hierofanía 2.

( The first one can be downloaded from hierofania.weebly.com )

It's my first attempt at animation, and I'm aware of many faults (and probably unaware of many other faults!) but I'm still quite proud of it.

I used pictures taken by @zaviel as reference for the city of Currents. 
The song was composed with Musescore.
The video was put together with VSDC Free Video Editor.
